column5: March is going to be a busy month.  To start March break there are 2 venues on Sunday the 10th: the Niagara Outdoor Show in Ft Erie the Bowmanville Taskle Swap Then on Saturday the 23rd there is the Hamilton Bassmasters Tackle Swap in Ancaster. This is the first time the son and I will be doing all 3 shows.
Way  to much ice out there still Bruce to be going to the shows. Finish the season  March 15 with whities, then hit the perch and pike.
~~~I'll be hitten the Bowmanville Tackle SwapShow

Good Luck at the shows Bruce.  I agree with B, but anyone not fishing should definitely consider trying to make it.  Really good mix of new and used gear and some really good deals to be had for the bargain hunter.
Only a few days away. If you get the chance, come down and say Hellooooooooooo.
